title: Finally, This activity teaches you on how to create string object and perform the build in operations on strings.

questionText.text:
Given a string, return a "rotated right 2" version where the last 2 chars are moved to the start. The string length will be at least 2.
right2("Hello") → loHel
right2("java") → vaja
right2("Hi") → Hi
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
